card.data.tireless.name: Tireless
card.data.tireless.actions.basic: Move2. At End of Turn you may shuffle the card back into your Deck (if it is not empty)

card.data.tireless.actions.advanced: Move4. At End of Turn you may put the card to the Top of your Deck
